headline: Assessing Boston Scientific (BSX) Valuation After The Penumbra Deal And Recent Share Moves
summary: Boston Scientific stock snapshot after recent moves Boston Scientific (BSX) has seen mixed returns recently, with the share price close to US$93.61 after a modest gain over the past week but declines over the past month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Boston Scientific. That recent short term share price weakness, with a 30 day share price return of a 2.55% decline and a 90 day share price return of a 6.67% decline, sits against a three year total shareholder return of 102.40%...
